definition: to pace back and forth/to hesitate/to be indecisive

sentences.english: Very uninterest hesitate life and mentally stupefied are following me.
sentences.chinese: 生活很无趣彷徨和迷茫伴随着我。

sentences.english: What have I been doing in that eight- thousand-day rush, apart from hesitating?
sentences.chinese: 正在八千少日的渐渐里，除彷徨外，又剩些什么呢？

sentences.english: Most viewers can empathize with the sense of hesitation and uncertainty embodied in such an image.
sentences.chinese: 大多数读者都能感受到这幅画中包含的犹豫和彷徨。

sentences.english: My thought struggled at confessing, somehow hesitation ended in flinching.
sentences.chinese: 然妾心忏悔，百般挣扎，踌躇彷徨，畏葸不前。

sentences.english: My fate vacillates aimlessly and finally runs its course.
sentences.chinese: 我宿命的在流浪之途彷徨，最后消失。

sentences.english: Billion of dollars make many every of us swirl.
sentences.chinese: 数十亿计美元的投入让每一个人都在彷徨。

sentences.english: At that moment, a lost kid constantly wonders, wanders, and flounders.
sentences.chinese: 在那时，一个迷失的小孩疑惑着，彷徨着，踌躇着。

sentences.english: They are bathed in the light of life, but hesitatingly love the unknown.
sentences.chinese: 虽是生命之光的沐浴，对于未知依然彷徨地爱着。

sentences.english: The pangs of despised love, the law's delay.
sentences.chinese: 那爱情被轻视的痛楚，权益被慢待的彷徨。

sentences.english: At night, zhaoqing alone at the bow, the past oscillated memory.
sentences.chinese: 入夜，肇庆单独彷徨在船头，往事记忆犹新。

sentences.english: For evilly had I left thee, and to my own hurt had I wandered away.
sentences.chinese: 因我不该离开你，我彷徨而去却伤到了自己。

sentences.english: I see the moon wiggling in the stream.
sentences.chinese: 明月在流水里飘忽彷徨。

sentences.english: She wanders along the solitary lane in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 她彷徨在这寂寥的雨巷。

sentences.english: Don't go out of the spring fragrance, recalling the stream.
sentences.chinese: 勿彷徨，脱素裹着春装，忆流芳。

sentences.english: I begin to be awfully hesitating, people are confused by Panama who shines you light.
sentences.chinese: 我开始极度彷徨，巴拿马让人迷茫，闪耀你发光。

sentences.english: Human, this strange animal, always in pacing back and forth a group advance.
sentences.chinese: 人，这个奇怪的动物，总是在彷徨中一路前进。

definition: anxious and perplexed/uneasy and confused/suspicious and fearful
to lose (sth)/to drop (sth)/to feel a sense of loss/frustrated/disappointment/loss
variant of 踟躕|踟蹰[chi2 chu2]
to tread/to tramp/to loiter/to hover around
